widget.setting: #root instanceof T(com.hybris.cockpitng.tree.node.TypeNode) and #root.id NE 'warehousing.typenode.return.waiting.goods' and #root.id NE 'warehousing.typenode.atpviews' and #root.id NE 'warehousing.treenode.taskassignment.inbox' and #root.id NE 'warehousing.treenode.order.shipping'

widget.title: Permission Management
widget.setting:
${c:l('permission.inherited')}
${c:l('permission.denied')}
${c:l('permission.granted')}
